conditions.name: Crohn's Disease
conditions.suggestion: CRITICAL: Regular monitoring essential. Common tablets: Mesalamine (800-1600mg three times daily), Prednisone (20-60mg) for acute flares, Azathioprine (50-150mg daily) for maintenance. IMPORTANT: Take iron supplements (325mg) if anemic. WARNING: Report severe pain or bleeding immediately. Stress management and dietary changes crucial.

conditions.name: Ulcerative Colitis
conditions.suggestion: URGENT: Control inflammation early. Common tablets: Sulfasalazine (500-4000mg daily in divided doses), Mesalamine (2.4-4.8g daily), Prednisone (40mg) for flares. ALERT: Complete full course of medications. WARNING: Seek immediate care for severe bleeding. Diet modifications essential.

conditions.name: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
conditions.suggestion: IMPORTANT: Identify trigger foods. Common tablets: Dicyclomine (20mg) before meals for cramping, Loperamide (2mg) for diarrhea episodes, Lubiprostone (8mcg twice daily) for constipation. REMEMBER: Keep food diary. Fiber supplements (Psyllium 500mg) helpful. Stress management crucial.

conditions.name: Celiac Disease
conditions.suggestion: CRITICAL: Strict gluten-free diet mandatory. Common tablets: Iron supplements (325mg daily), Vitamin D3 (2000-4000 IU daily), B12 (1000mcg daily), Calcium (1000mg daily). WARNING: Even small amounts of gluten can cause damage. IMPORTANT: Read all food labels carefully.

conditions.name: Gastritis
conditions.suggestion: CAUTION: Avoid irritating foods. Common tablets: Omeprazole (20mg) or Pantoprazole (40mg) daily before breakfast, Sucralfate (1g four times daily), Antacids like Calcium carbonate (500-1000mg) as needed. ALERT: Report black stools or severe pain. Stress management important.
